job.title: Data Engineer (AWS/PySpark)</strong></p><p><strong> Job Location:: Malvern, PA</strong></p><p><strong>Job Type:: Full time</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Must have - AWS cloud platform using PySpark on EMR Glue ETL </strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p>1 Experience in building large scale batch and data pipelines with data processing frameworks in AWS cloud platform using PySpark on EMR Glue ETL </p><p>2 Deep experience in developing data processing data manipulation tasks using &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;such as reading data from external sources merge data perform data enrichment and load in to target data destinations </p><p>3 Proficiency with Big Data processing technologies Hadoop Hive or Databricks </p><p>4 Experience in deployment and operationalizing the code using CI CD tools Bitbucket and Bamboo </p><p>5 Experience with SQL and relational databases </p><p>6 Strong AWS cloud computing experience Extensive experience in Lambda S3 EMR Redshift</p><p>&nbsp;</p>", "employmentType": "FULL_TIME", "hiringOrganization": {"@type": "Organization", "name": "Ambrosia Infotech Ltd.", "sameAs": "https://www.linkedin.com/company/ambrosia-infotech-ltd."}, "identifier": {"@type": "PropertyValue", "name": "Ambrosia Infotech Ltd."}, "image": null, "industry": "", "jobLocation": {"@type": "Place", "address": {"@type": "PostalAddress", "addressCountry": "US", "addressLocality": "United States", "addressRegion": null, "postalCode": "99999", "streetAddress": null}, "latitude": 39.50355, "longitude": -99.0183}, "skills": "", "title": "Data Engineer (AWS/PySpark)", "validThrough": "2021-08-05T14:37:49.000Z", "educationRequirements": {"@type": "EducationalOccupationalCredential", "credentialCategory": "bachelor degree"}, "jobLocationType": "TELECOMMUTE", "applicantLocationRequirements": {"@type": "Country", "name": "United States"}}
